body_html:
@smit-hinsu Is MaxBytesInUse to report memory usage when training or before training?
Not until sess.run(training) is launched does the engine started to occupy some GPU memory. If the session is already triggered which just results in OOM, it would be too late and useless to know MaxBytesInUse then.
body_text:
@smit-hinsu Is MaxBytesInUse to report memory usage when training or before training?
Not until sess.run(training) is launched does the engine started to occupy some GPU memory. If the session is already triggered which just results in OOM, it would be too late and useless to know MaxBytesInUse then.
body:
@smit-hinsu Is `MaxBytesInUse` to report memory usage when training or before training?
Not until `sess.run(training)` is launched does the engine started to occupy some GPU memory. If the session is already triggered which just results in OOM, it would be too late and useless to know `MaxBytesInUse` then.
